input: Batch request to create multiple lock requests and update a third one with a new note and end date.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

POST /BankCustomerLockRequests HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"PartyIdentifyingElements":{"PartyUUID":"12345678-90ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef"},"EventCode":"104000","UserStatusCode":"2","ValidityStartDate":"2023-10-17","Note":"Request related to loan contract."}

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

POST /BankCustomerLockRequests HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"PartyIdentifyingElements":{"PartyID":"312345"},"EventCode":"206000","UserStatusCode":"1","Note":"This lock is due to a specific customer request event."}

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

PATCH /BankCustomerLockRequests/220 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"Note":"Customer has relocated to a new address.","ValidityEndDate":"2024-12-31"}

--request-separator--
